short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enuf is enuf but 'enough' is too much!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension simplifies English spelling by making the following text replacements in web pages you visit:

    although -> altho
    catalogue -> catalog
    cough -> coff
    dialogue -> dialog
    doughnut -> donut
    enough -> enuf
    laugh -> laff
    laughter -> lafter
    neighbor -> nabor
    neighbour -> nabor
    rough -> ruff
    though -> tho
    through -> thru
    tough -> tuff
    you -> u
    you'd -> u'd
    you'll -> u'll
    you've -> u'v
    your -> ur
    yours -> urs
    yourself -> urself
